title: Digestive Enzymes with Probiotics by Success Chemistry - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Enhance your digestive health with Digestive Enzymes with Probiotics by Success Chemistry®. This advanced formula combines powerful digestive enzymes with beneficial probiotics to support healthy digestion and optimize nutrient absorption. Designed to effectively break down proteins, fats, and carbohydrates, this supplement alleviates bloating and promotes overall gut health, making it ideal for those experiencing digestive discomfort. Key Benefits:
  • Improves Digestive Health: Supports breakdown of proteins, fats, and carbohydrates for better digestion.
  • Reduces Bloating: Aids digestion to minimize post-meal bloating and discomfort.
  • Enhances Nutrient Absorption: Maximizes the absorption of essential nutrients from food.
  • Supports Gut Health: Probiotics maintain a healthy balance of gut bacteria.
Ingredients:
  • Makzyme-Pro™: A comprehensive enzyme blend for protein, fat, and carbohydrate breakdown.
  • Bromelain & Papain: Enzymes from pineapple and papaya for protein digestion.
  • Lactobacillus Acidophilus & Casei: Probiotics that support gut health and digestion.
Achieve better digestion and improved gut health with Success Chemistry’s Digestive Enzymes with Probiotics! Incorporate Success Chemistry® Digestive Enzymes with Probiotics into your daily routine to enhance digestive health, reduce bloating, and improve nutrient absorption. Experience the comprehensive benefits of our advanced digestive support formula and achieve better gut health naturally.
shortDescriptionHtml: Improve digestive health and reduce bloating with Success Chemistry's Digestive Enzymes with Probiotics. Our comprehensive formula enhances nutrient absorption and supports gut health. 60 capsules per bottle.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 1 Veggie Capsule
Servings Per Container: 60

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Makzyme-Pro™ 2500 HUT/400 mg **
Enzyme Blend:
Fungal Protease from Aspergillus oryzae
Lactobacillus acidophilus
Lactobacillus casei
Lactobacillus plantarum
Bromelain 90 GDU **
Papain 2670 TU **
Fungal Lipase 1500 FIP **
Fungal Lactase 600 LACU **
Alpha Galactosidase 300 GALU **

** Daily Value (DV) not established

Other Ingredients: Cellulose (Vegetable Capsule), Vegetable Magnesium Stearate, Silicon Dioxide.
Distributed by: successchemistry.com
